title: Heyui67
author: Heyui67
content: Looking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that return 50$ daily

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Before asking for investment platform that will give you $50 daily you must first mention the amount you want to invest at first. Because you can't invest $20 and expect to receive $50 daily and besides I don't think there's any place to give you such amount all less you invested about $10k maybe with the little changes in market you may decides to do DCA or fully involved yourself with scalping. Please do not desperately go ahead investing in a platform that would result to scam at last because I know too well that newbies are too impatient.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on May 03, 2023, 05:47:44 PMLooking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that return 50$ daily Your post history is full of similar questions, except you dropped $100 per day to $50 per day. Yet there are not guaranteed methods to make steady income. Even when you are "staking" your money, the price could fluctuate during it a lot. In fact that's why people make money with crypto, because of the price volatility. That however can make you rekt as well.There's no such thing as a steady income of $50 per day unless you are filthy rich and want to compromise your wallet. And if someone says there is, he/she is probably scamming you.

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on May 03, 2023, 05:47:44 PMLooking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that return 50$ daily You can invest your time in bitcointalk and receive 50 weekly in signature campaigns. But you really need to invest your time, acquire and share your knowledge. Otherwise you won't receive anything.It is an amazing deal imo.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: bitmover on May 03, 2023, 08:47:23 PMYou can invest your time in bitcointalk and receive 50 weekly in signature campaigns. But you really need to invest your time, acquire and share your knowledge. Otherwise you won't receive anything.It is an amazing deal imo.The OP really has a long way to go in order to archive that; he might even get tired on the way. Signature that can pay him at least $50 per week is when he has reached senior member rank, which can take about 8 months to obtain the required activity, and for the merit requirement, it really takes much effort too.Quote from: Heyui67 on May 03, 2023, 05:47:44 PMLooking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that return 50$ daily OP, @bitmover have a great idea for you that is very likely archivable. At least it is better to do so instead of getting involved with some sort of investment platform that can mess with your funds. Apart from online investment, if you are aware of real estate investment, I think it's a low-risk investment with a good ROI, but it depends on the amount you are investing. Also, the income doesn't come weekly.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on May 03, 2023, 05:47:44 PMLooking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that return 50$ daily Perhaps you could go and buy twitter from Elon Musk or Facebook, WhatsApp from Mark Zuckerberg or the metaverse itself. Having shares on them won't be a bad idea and it all depends on if you've got just some good enough cash to get them deal you some shares.Othe than that, you might as well look towards developing something of your own, maybe own a site, gambling site (casino/sportsbook) and the lots of them out there. Meanwhile, you have to be mindful of how you go about searching out these opportunities, there are a lot of others wanting what you've got and won't give anything back. Watch yourself!

comments.author: Bushdark
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on May 03, 2023, 05:47:44 PMLooking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that return 50$ daily  This is a two similar questions that had been asked before here multiple answers and I am still very surprised seeing it again one more time. This question can be directed to Google search for good answers with link to how to get started earning $50 daily. For me it all depends on what op really mean by eaening uoto $50 pee day. If I am not mistaking, there are so many jobs op can do to earn even more than $100 a day if he has the skill that is required. Many of these jobs that we need to do to earn up to this amount or more will need us to be able to know what we are doing so thar earn even more money. There are so many online Jobs that can even pay more than this amount but one will need to have the information on ground.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on May 03, 2023, 05:47:44 PMLooking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that return 50$ daily Of course, there are many ways to invest to earn $50 a day.  For example, you buy shares worth 200 billion dollars in well-known giant companies, and it is certain that the annual returns will bring you more daily interest than the amount you dream of.  This is one of the easiest ways without talking about potential losses or where you will get the $200 billion from.  With regard to encrypted currencies, in any case, you will enter into a kind of betting in any case, because you may achieve daily returns of fifty dollars or more, or less as well.  Your question is very general without specifying the amount that you will invest, and in any case, it is not possible to achieve fixed returns on a daily or even annual basis because the market movement does not take an upward trend permanently, which is what you must be aware of before investing any amount.

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on May 03, 2023, 05:47:44 PMLooking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that return 50$ daily You can invest $500,000 in a 1-year treasury bill online and receive $50/day. Otherwise, you are going to get scammed.

comments.author: STT
comments.body: 50$  daily is still a fair amount, theres the possibility you could invest just 100$   every month into a variety of funds and that would be quite sensible.  Because of pension funds and the millions who contribute to those there is a whole range of options and fund choices you could take, an entire industry to investigate.   Crypto I tried to explore with a pension provider I use but they refused on the grounds of paperwork vs regulation etc. its outside the allowed regime in that particular instance but its not always the case so you may be able to put small amounts from commodities to bonds to stocks in a safe way.  Guaranteed returns I dont like as much, you want a certain amount and it will tend to cost more to acquire that certainty.  Traditional investment requires that you risk to invest with some faith and insight into that sector and likely performance, to demand returns is not cheap afaik.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on May 03, 2023, 05:47:44 PMLooking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that returns 50$ daily If you keep asking questions like this, you'll end up on a scam platform where your money will be stolen. If you're expecting someone to come to your thread and tell you a site where you can put your money and instantly start making money, I'm sorry to disappoint you, but there isn't one. I see you've asked this question several times and haven't responded to any of them; I'm sure you'll abandon this thread even if you receive useful advice and then start another thread with the same question later on. At the very least, try to interact with those who are commenting and read through all of the suggestions before selecting the one that suites you best.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on May 03, 2023, 05:47:44 PMLooking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that return 50$ daily If you don't have knowledge in what your invest, it means you are gambling on your investment. Nothing to instant in this world, you must get hard work to make it ($50 daily income) happen, In here, even several member have enough or more skill knwoledge about bitcoin, but still they only get income about $15-$20 daily. In fact, some of members are not considered to join due lack of knowledge even have long time joined on this forum. Which this example, you must think 1st yourself, what you have, and what you offer, so if only have mediocre abilities, you shouldn't be considered to get $50 daily.

comments.author: reagansimms
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on May 03, 2023, 05:47:44 PMLooking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that return 50$ daily Your question seems strange to me, you want to make $50 per day without mentioning the risk of loss. Every Investment there are always two opposite sides that might be faced, besides that no one can guarantee you can make $ 50 every day. If anyone can guarantee $50 daily profit I will give him $20 as a thank you for suggesting me on a profitable online investment platform. The nominal amount of money that you have also determines the amount that will be generated, if your money is less than $ 50 it is impossible to get $ 50 every day.

comments.author: gaston castano
comments.body: you will easily get 50$ every day, if you invest 1 billion$.if you have it you will easily earn 50$ some maybe more than that.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Quote from: gaston castano on May 04, 2023, 03:28:19 AMyou will easily get 50$ every day, if you invest 1 billion$.if you have it you will easily earn 50$ some maybe more than that.He doesn’t need a billion to only make $50 a day. Honestly with enough money you can make that with TBills pretty much which is almost risk free, well as long as the US doesn’t default.With trading it’s difficult to make consistent gains. If you try and make a daily profit everyday you will set yourself up for failure and lose it all. Basically just take opportunities when you see them, don’t try and force any trades which you shouldn’t be taking.

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on May 03, 2023, 05:47:44 PMLooking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that return 50$ daily It seems difficult to make $50 a day from the same capital, unless you have a large capital to make $50 a day. And while you can with the same capital and make the same profit in a day, you need to have some extra skills and time to do it, but it is not guaranteed.My advice is that you should buy used items that you know and are in demand by many people, and for you to resell and make the items you bought before become perfect again. And offer your item online and use social media to tell more people about your item and sell it for more than your purchase price, and don't forget to bid on used items you buy so you get the same return. And even more than that, if you are good at it.and if you want to invest you can do it after you earn with what i mentioned above, and you can do both and it is so much better.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: It's definitely not a crypto-based investment instrument and closer to ponzi where they can promise profits with fixed numbers. You have to really learn how it works if your interest is serious enough.Initially I wanted to suggest staking if you give preference to the capital you put up, but this seems to be gradually losing interest as it turns into bullshit tokens.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on May 03, 2023, 05:47:44 PMLooking for investment method for 50$ dailyIs there online investment that return 50$ daily The question is how much is your capital? maybe later on you're looking for 50$ daily and then your capital is still less than the income you're looking for.As always, you're a newbie here on the forum and that's what you're looking for right away, I don't think you'll last long in the crypto space. Do you think it's that easy to earn that kind of money in the crypto business? First study this dude, and find out how to make money from it.
